results.content: This was an amazing course! I can't say enough good things about this course. Sekhar Metla is an amazing instructor, and did an extremely great job teaching all that was promised in the course description. I'm happy "The Full Stack Web Development 2021 Bootcamp" was my FIRST programming course! I feel confident enough to move onto more specific courses. Thank you SekharMetla!!!!

results.content: Being a former developer going back to web development after a long hiatus, I would highly recommend this course to any one who wants to widen their horizon about Web Development.  Even if you din't know the basics about web development, then also this course guide you to learn the complete course.  Salute to sekhar for making this course so lucid and concise. I Admire his teaching style and would like to hear more from him related to Web Development. Keep up the great work Dear.

results.content: Fabulous course! It is completely reconstruct me from 0 to hero.  The main thing is a wonderful instructor, absolutely no doubts about that. Overall, a great learning experience.I love the way of explaining the topics and looking forward to take the Part 2 of this course - The Advanced Web Development Boot camp. I have recommended this course to a few of my friends. Great course for anyone just getting started with Web Development.
